entry.title: Data Lightning Atomic Swap (DLAS-down, DLAS-up)
entry.summary: In this email conversation, Takaya Imai thanks ZmnSCPxj for recommending a version with no restrictions for download cases. ZmnSCPxj provides a link to the recommended version which allows for data of any size to be downloaded. For upload cases, ZmnSCPxj suggests using OG AMP or payment points + scalars and payment decorrelation. They mention that the summed blinding factor can be used to send data to the payee by using an encryption key. Overall, the email pertains to suggestions for optimizing data transfer in various scenarios.
